segments.text: I ’ d like to apply for a secretarial position .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very well , do you know any shorthand ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but I can write very fast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you use the computer or other office machines ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but I ’ d like to learn how to use them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I see , this is a permanent position .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you work every day from 9 to 5 ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no , I ’ m student at a university , and I have to study most of the time . I can only work part time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I couldn ’ t possibly hire you . You can ’ t take shorthand , you can ’ t use a computer , and you can only work part time .
segments.speaker: S1
